brief_title: Subcutaneous Amifostine (Ethyol®) in the Prevention of Radiochemotherapy-Induced Esophagitis and Pneumonitis in Patients With Unresectable Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to assess the activity of subcutaneous (SC) amifostine on the incidence and severity of acute radiochemotherapy-induced esophagitis in patients with unresectable Stage IIIA or IIIB non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) receiving combined modality therapy.
criteria: You may be eligible for this study if you are 18 years of age or older and: - Have UnResectable Stage IIIA or IIIB Non Small Cell Lung Cancer - Have never had prior chemotherapy with Paclitaxel or Carboplatin - Have never had prior thoracic radiation therapy (XRT)
